conversation_turns.message: I know what you're going through. IVF can be a challenging journey, but we're here to help every step of the way.
What accommodation options are available near your clinic?

For Gopal Mansion, an air-conditioned room with TV and bath is Rs 800 per night. **We also offer specially subsidized air-conditioned rooms at our clinic for Rs 2000 (US $50) per night which include breakfast and medical monitoring.**
conversation_turns.evaluation_note: Hallucination/Factual Error: The bolded section regarding 'subsidized rooms at our clinic' is explicitly noted as incorrect
